unit.data.coldfire_golem.name: ColdFire Golem
unit.data.coldfire_golem.lore: Created by the Ice Mages from the Arcane Order to help fight back the invaders. The ColdFire Golems are born of Ice turned Flame contained in a metallic carcass.
unit.data.coldfire_golem.description.vis: Metallic golem, similar in shape as a furnace except blue flames are ocming out of every orifice. His head is shaped like a polished pointy stone with a single glowing blue crystal in the center. He is surrounded by blue icy flames.
